sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Tax Delinquency Amnesty Act.

sections.heading: Amnesty program. The Department shall establish an amnesty
sections.text:
program for all taxpayers owing any tax imposed by reason of or pursuant to
authorization by any law of the State of Illinois and collected by the
Department.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
